text: Prepare the oatmeal. Use the package directions or make it how you usually make it. Pare and core apples.  Slice apples.  Mix together the water and sugar over a medium-high heat. Until sugar has dissolved completely. Stir consistently to ensure that the sugar does not stick to the bottom of the saucepan. Add apple slices to sugar syrup.  Cook the apple slices until they are tender but not mushy. They should not be cooked to the extent where they fall apart. Spoon the cooked oatmeal into bowls.  Make a well in the oatmeal with your spoon. This is so you can add the apples inside. Fill the hole with apple slices. Be generous to ensure the best taste. Serve with milk or cream.
